name: Volunteer's Battlegear
tooltip:
Volunteer's Battlegear

Bring 5 Cenarion Combat Badges, 3 Cenarion Logistics Badges and 7 Cenarion Tactical Badges to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Friendly reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Cenarion Combat Badge x 5
- Cenarion Logistics Badge x 3
- Cenarion Tactical Badge x 7
- Cenarion Circle:
